node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 30 Axle Shaft Assemblies
node.long_desc: Dana Spicer Dana 30 Axle Shaft Assemblies are ultrasonically tested for unparalleled reliability.;Spicer parts are designed, engineered, and manufactured to meet or exceed OE requirements because they are OE parts, ensuring a perfect fit with our full line of industry-leading axles.;Spicer Dana 30 Axle Shaft Assemblies are heat treated and cold formed rolled to ensure a much more consistent and stronger axle shaft.;Spicer axle shafts undergo fatigue testing and ultrasonic testing, delivering a safety factor that's high even by OE standards.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Get genuine performance from genuine Spicer. Spicer parts are designed, engineered, and manufactured to meet or exceed OE requirements because they are OE parts, ensuring a perfect fit with our full line of industry-leading axles. That's why Spicer is the name you can trust for top performance and durability. Through heat treating and a slower quality scan rate, Dana is able to deliver a much more consistent and stronger Spicer axle shaft. In addition, the cold-formed rolled spline eliminates the need for machining, which can cause stress fractures and premature failures. And not only are Spicer axle shafts fatigue-tested to last, 100% of our front axle parts are ultrasonically tested, so we're able to check for any internal cracks that regular magnetic testing can't reach. We're proud to claim a safety factor that's high even by OE standardsbecause when it comes to the performance of your axles, there's no room for compromise.

The same heat treating, slower quality scan rate and cold-formed rolled spline also enable Spicer to deliver a much more consistent and stronger rear axle shaft, with less of the machining that can lead to stress fractures and premature failure. In addition, Spicer rear axle shafts undergo the same fatigue testing and ultrasonic testing, delivering a safety factor that's high even by OE standards.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Elite Freedom Panel Knobs
node.sales_desc: High-quality cast aluminum construction and our own distinctive Elite styling to make the new Elite Freedom Panel Knobs an essential upgrade for your JK's interior. Each knob is precision-engineered to fit and function as well as the original knobs but with a renewed sense of strength and style. A durable textured black powder coat makes these knobs truly stand out from the crowd and insures a lifetime of use.

node.display_name: Poison Spyder Bolt-Together Trail Cage Kits
node.long_desc: The Poison Spyder Trail Cage is designed for those who already have the factory roll bar and want to add onto it instead of installing a new cage;Tubular kit components are constructed from 1.75 inch .120 wall DOM structural tubing;CNC-bent and laser-notched for a precise fit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Poison Spyder Trail Cage is designed for those Jeep owners who already have the factory roll bar, and would like to add on to it to form a full roll cage rather than installing a complete new cage. The Trail Cage kit is an eight piece set. It comes with two Lower A-Pillars (dash to floor supports) and two tubular Upper A-pillars that are to be welded to the factory windshield bars. Also included are a dash bar, upper windshield bar, and two center spreaders that can be located in several positions.

The Poison Spyder Trail Cage kit comes disassembled and requires welding to install. The Lower A-Pillar is designed to provide a strong foundation for the forward section of the cage while not intruding into the dash or compromising legroom. The Trail Cage is secured at the windshield, at the front gusseted A-Pillar, at factory mounts on the door jamb and to the floor through the forward drain hole. This provides solid strength from the top of the windshield to the floor. The Lower A-Pillars and gussets are CNC laser cut and precision brake-formed for quality and fit. Tubular kit components are constructed from 1.75 inch.120 wall DOM structural tubing. All tubular components are CNC-bent and laser-notched for a precise fit, and laser-marked with reference numbers for easy identification and installation.

node.display_name: Poison Spyder Rear Bumper Brace Kits
node.long_desc: 3/16 inch steel plate;Gussetted brace;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Poison Spyder Jeep TJ Rear Bumper Brace Kit adds more strength to your TJ's rear bumper mounting. This is especially important if you intend to tow, use bumper-mounted recovery points, or a bumper-mounted spare tire carrier. This is a recommended upgrade for all Poison Spyder TJ rear bumpers, including the RockBrawler and BFH line of rear bump.
Rampage's new Recovery Trail Gear is a full line of off-road accessories to help you on your trail, camping and overland adventures.

node.long_desc: Poison Spyder Customs BFH Body Mounts are constructed of beefy 3/16 inch plate steel;CNC laser cut, precision brake-formed and professionally MIG welded for a precise fit;Designed to act like a ramp to help you slide up and over rocks;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you've had your Jeep in the rocksespecially extreme rock trails like The Hammersyou know what this is all about. The stock body mounts on the Jeep TJ are made of pretty thin sheetmetal. Combine that with the fact that they're hanging right there in the way when you're trying to squeeze through, around, and over the rocks. The result is they can take quite a beating, and usually end up looking like they've been hit with a wrecking ball. Repeatedly. Not only that, the stock perches weren't designed with rockodynamics" in mindthat is, they're not very good at sliding over the rocks rather than hanging up on them."

Bare aluminum;Unpainted so you can match your vehicle;Made from 3/16 inch aluminum plate;Includes the latches, lockable keys and all mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Tired of the limited functionality of your Jeep's swing-out tailgate? Do you yearn for the convenience and functionality of the drop-down tailgates from back in the day? Looking to shed a few pounds while gaining a smooth new look for your trail rig? The Poison Spyder TrailGate replaces your Jeep's heavy, cumbersome swing-out tailgate with a lightweight, sleek, aluminum drop-down gate and Tramp Stamp. The complete TrailGate kit includes the aluminum TrailGate panel, lower Tramp Stamp heavy duty hinges, locking flush-mount latches, limiting cables, brackets, weather-strips and hardware. The gate panel is CNC laser-cut and precision brake-formed from 3/16 aluminum plate. The Tramp Stamp piece is CNC laser-cut from the same 3/16" aluminum plate, featuring the Poison Spyder logo across the center. The Tramp Stamp and cable brackets install using nut-serts, which are provided in the complete hardware kit, along with stainless steel button head fasteners. The high quality latches are lockable (keys are included) and sit flush when closed to maintain the sleek profile of the TrailGate. Replacement steel body parts are sold AS IS. Some minor imperfections or damage can occur during shipping. Professional installation recommended. Claims for freight damage must be placed directly with freight carriers."

node.long_desc: Poison Spyder Trail Corners are laser cut from 3/16 inch steel and precision formed for perfect fitment around your Jeep's corner;The Black powder coated trail corners include stainless steel hardware for durablility that will last year after year;Poison Spyder Trail Corners are available with or without the pre-cut gas filler, taillight and license plate holes there is a style for everyone's needs;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Poison Spyder Trail Corners are a simple addition to protect and enhance one of your Jeep's most vulnerable areas from rock damage. Trail corners are laser cut from 3/16 inch steel and precision formed for perfect fitment around your Jeep's corner and OEM flares. Trail Corners are secured with stainless steel button head hardware, included in the kit along with detailed installation instructions. All mounting holes, gas filler, taillight and license plate holes are pre-cut. Original license plate hardware can be re-used. Trail Corners come powder coated black.

Trail Corners are available in two designs. With the OEM Taillights" version, the factory taillight box can be re-used. With the "LED Taillights" version, high intensity LED taillights can be installed. LED taillights and electronic flashers are avialable from Poison Spyder, on our LED Taillights page. LED taillights require additional cutting of your Jeep's sheetmetal and minor wiring.

Trail Corners are designed as easy bolt-on trail protection for moderate use. If you need the ultimate in hard core corner protection for your Jeep, check out Poison Spyder Crusher Corners"
Perfect compliment Artec Corner Armor products including Standard wheelbase and Stretch versions.

Bolts to bottom of Poison Spyder Bruizer series Front Bumpers (sold separately);Covers factory crash bar" and protects stock Jeep electrical swaybar disconnect mechanism;CNC laser cut from 3/16" plate steel;Precision brake-formed for a perfect fit;SpyderShell Armor Coat semi-gloss black finish;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Bruizer Front Skid is an optional addition to the Bruizer Series front bumper. This skid attaches to the bottom of the Bruizer bumper to conceal and protect the stock crash bar", plus it has an extension to protect the electronic swaybar disconnect motor found on Rubicon JK's. This product is finished in black with Poison Spyder's proprietary SpyderShell Armor Coat process.

Plate Steel Construction
The skid is made of CNC laser-cut 3/16" plate steel, precision brake-formed for a precise fit to the Bruizer bumper. The faceted design is engineered to be low profile yet heavy duty. That is, its size and shape is the smallest it can be in order to miss rocks and trail obstacles altogether, allowing the tires to reach the obstacle in order to grip and pull the Jeep up and over. But in the event the skid does make contact with the terrain, the beefy 3/16" plate steel will protect the Rubicon electrical sway bar disconnect, while its slanted design helps slide the Jeep up and over. Poison Spyder's signature oval lightening holes remove excess weight while contributing to the product's great looks.

SpyderShell Armor Coat
SpyderShell is more than just powder coatingit's a complete system that includes the state of the art in preparation, application, materials and packaging to ensure that your SpyderShell products stay looking great for years. The SpyderShell process has been engineered to provide your Poison Spyder product with years of unmatched great looks, corrosion protection and weather-resistance. Our proprietary 6-stage system starts with media blasting the entire part, to remove contaminents and prep the metal surface for the best possible adhesion. Next, any seams are sealed with 3M Scotch-Weld to block moisture from entering and causing corrosion where the powder can not reach. The first coat to be applied is a zinc-rich powdered black primer, which is baked on to form an impenetrable bond between the metal product and the"

node.sales_desc: The Hybrid Soft Sided Cooler is the first of its kind! At AO Coolers we are leading the industry and changing the way of soft sided coolers. This rigid Soft Sided Cooler is a hybrid of sewn and welded construction, with a molded EVA tub bottom. The same durable and eco-friendly TPU liner, same YKK zipper as our other coolers. The exterior is a new design that is tough, and very durable like a hard sided cooler with the weight of a soft sided cooler. Making it the most Rigid Soft Sided cooler on the market. Available in two sizes!

node.long_desc: 3.6L V6 engine;12 hp and 13 lbs. x ft. of torque;Dry reusable filter;Uses factory mounting points;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Jammer cold air intake for the 2012-2018 Jeep Wrangler outflows the factory intake system by 48% for maximum performance gains of 12 hp and 13 lbs. x ft. of torque. Superchips has flow while lowering Intake Air Temps (I.A.T). The dry filter is low maintenance and is washable/reusable. Jammer uses factory mounting points. This intake system is made in the USA and is a must for your daily drive JK or the trip to Jeep Beach, Moab, etc. Superchips Flashpaq and TrailDash2 programming bundle perfectly with this kit. Note - tuning coming soon for 2018 JK.

Want to get the most performance and best recovery experience out of your winch? Daystar Plasma winch lines are the answer! Daystar Plasma synthetic fiber winch lines are specially formulated and altered at a molecular level for optimum strength. Since Daystar Plasma synthetic winch lines are 86% lighter than steel cable they are easier to handle, quicker to rig and safer to use than any steel cable. They will not rust, corrode or develop skin-tearing fish hook" burrs as wire rope can.
Since Daystar Plasma synthetic winch lines develop no kinks and have no memory like steel cable they will spool more evenly and pull off the drum easier than steel making them stronger, safer, and more reliable than any steel cable on the market. Daystar Plasma winch lines don't store energy so you will get no whiplash or recoil eliminating any opportunity for the rope snapping back. Made in the USA, Daystar Plasma synthetic winch lines are ready for the toughest jobs both on- and off-road."

node.long_desc: Up to 28% stretch;Ideal for UTV, side-by-side vehicles, trucks or Jeeps;Water, UV and abrasion resistant polyurethane coating;2-year warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Want the best and strongest Recovery Rope in the World? Daystar is the answer. Daystar Kinetic Recovery Ropes give you a 16 M.P.H. head start over the competition! Daystar Recovery Ropes utilize KINETIC ENERGY accumulated in each recovery rope as it stretches to increase the pulling force and reduce the sudden impact generated by conventional tow straps. Every inch the rope stretches results in KINETIC ENERGY which transfers into force directed towards the stuck vehicle or object your are pulling out, allowing for a smooth un-jarring extraction.

node.long_desc: Industrial-strength;Leather-grain vinyl fabric;Hard roll-up, Xtra-low profile;Heavy-duty aluminum slats;Quick and easy Install, No special tools or drilling;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The all-new Sentry by TruXedo combines all the same great features of the Sentry CT but with an industrial-strength, leather-grain vinyl fabric. This hard roll-up style truck bed cover features an Xtra-low profile. We've pressure bonded the vinyl fabric to heavy-duty aluminum slats making Sentry the ultimate in durability and security. When rolled up tightly at the cab, the cover provides full bed access without blocking rear view visibility or the third brake light. When closed, the Sentry's flush mount profile delivers a sleek look that's sure to impress! An extra security latch is located towards the center of the cover for enhanced security so you can rest in the fact that your cargo is safe and sound.

node.display_name: Roll N Lock M-Series Tonneau Covers
node.long_desc: Unique Construction - Contoured, patented hinge design provides smooth, frictionless rotation;Torsion Spring Equipped - employs a heavy-duty torsion spring drive which is housed in a 3 aluminum reel;Built-In Tailgate Lock - Keep cargo safe with the integrated tailgate lock;Patented, four-point locking system provides instant security;Clamp-On installation - clamp-on track design greatly simplifies the installation process;Drainage - recessed drain fittings ensure rapid and complete drainage of the unit housing;Backed by a 3-year Limited Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
From its retractable function, which permits opening or closing in literally seconds, to its rigid, vinyl-over-aluminum laminated construction, the Roll-N-Lock M-Series hybrid cover offers everything other covers do not. There are no snaps to manipulate, there is no roll or bundle to lash down or stow, no crossbars to negotiate, no fabric shrinkage to struggle with, no folding or solid hinged covers to combat, and, best of all, no worries about the security of cargo. The Roll-N-Lock M-Series tonneau coverby far the most intelligent and versatile tonneau cover made.
What sets Roll-N-Lock's M-Series tonneau cover construction apart from the competition is not just the superior quality of our vinyl surface material, but also the design of the slatted aluminum substrate which supports the vinyl. Each Roll-N-Lock slat is rotatively joined by an interlocking hinge. It is the geometry of this uniquely-contoured hinge that lends Roll-N-Lock tonneau covers their strength, quiet, smooth, non-binding movement and roll compactness. Close examination of the Roll-N-Lock hinge in the flat position reveals the fact that each slat is inseparably locked together, yet when rotated, no metal-to-metal contact occurs.

node.display_name: Auburn Gear High Performance Series Differentials
node.long_desc: Improves traction over factory open differential;Engineered to provide the ultimate in torque bias;Preloaded cone-style clutch system;Ultra-smooth engagement for street use;Hardened spider gears;Quiet operation perfect for daily driving;1-Year Warranty and 4 Year Replacement/Exchange Warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Put more power to the pavement with Auburn Gear's HP Series Limited Slip Differential (LSD). Unlike plate or gear-type differentials, Auburn Gear's HP LSD features a unique cone clutch design which provides additional torque bias. That improved torque bias improves both traction and performance. Torque bias is the ability of any LSD to transfer torque from the wheel with the least amount of traction to the wheel with the most amount of traction.

If your off-road vehicle serves double-duty as both a recreational vehicle and daily driver, the Auburn Gear HP LSD provides smooth engagement and actuation with none of the annoying clatter found with solid spools. The driving experience makes for peace-of-mind operation, with less drivetrain fatigue and shock that's common with performance-only spools.

The Auburn Gear HP LSD is made right here in the USA, and offers a generous 4-year replacement via the D-RE program along with the standard 1-year warranty.

node.long_desc: Engineered to switch from Limited Slip to full Locking Differential on the fly;Smooth engagement makes it well-suited for street use;Activated via in-vehicle switch;Gearing manufactured from aircraft quality 9310 billet steel;Heat treated for additional strength;Can be used with or without lockout hubs;No additional parts required for installation;1-year replacement warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Finally, Auburn Gear offers a solution which offers two traction enhancing differentials in one package: a full-time limited-slip for daily driving in addition to a full-locking differential, which can be activated at the flip of a switch. The selection between both modes can be done on-the-fly, so you don't have to press pause during the middle of your off-road excursion.

How it works: The Auburn Gear Ected Max is a selectable traction device; an on/off switch is mounted near the driver. When off (limted-slip mode), the clutch pack provides the smooth actuation of a standard open differential. As torque increases, the separating forces within the differential gears increase, causing the clutch pack to be compressed and thereby providing bias torque to the high traction wheel. This essentially acts as your performance limited-slip differential. When the user flicks the switch to on, electrical current is sent to the electromagnetic coil which engages full-lock, allowing both drive wheels to receive equal amounts of torque.

This will allow your vehicle to climb out of trouble--all at the flip of a switch. You get the high-performance daily driveability of a limited-slip differential with the full-locking action of a solid spool/locker--the best of both worlds.

Lastly, the Auburn Gear Ected Max Differential comes with a 1-year warranty, further boosting both peace-of- mind and value.
"

node.sales_desc: The Sport Seat was designed for the daily driver. This seat maintains the stock look but provides you comfort like no stock seat can. For those of you who have worn out your stock seats or just think it's too uncomfortable, this is the seat for you! The Sport Seat will not only enhance your driving experience but will also provide ultimate comfort that your stocks seats don't provide. As a rule of thumb, the Sport Seat will fit up to a 40-inch waist. The Wide version will fit up to a 44-inch waist.

node.sales_desc: Corbeau Moab Recliner Seats offer a tubular steel frame, high density injection molded foam, enhanced thigh and side bolstering to hold you in place, and through-the-back harness capability for extra safety while driving off-road. These are a direct bolt-in for Jeep CJ and YJ with no brackets needed. Mounting for TJ Wrangler requires the use of the Corbeau Seat Brackets, sold separately.

node.long_desc: Safari Fold and Tumble Seats;Powdercoated tubular steel frame;Heavily padded foam for ultimate comfort;Comes with floor mounts and rear lock-down brackets;Older models (85 and older) may require drilling;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Safari Jeep Seat is a rear fold and tumble seat designed as a bolt in replacement for CJ and YJ Jeeps and a perfect match for the Corbeau Moab front seats. The Safari Jeep Seat is available in matching stock Jeep black, tan, spice, and charcoal fabrics. If your stock fold and tumble seat is worn out and you want to give your Jeep a new interior, the Safari is the perfect addition. If your budget doesn't allow you to get new front seats, the Safari will match your stock front Jeep seats. The Safari can also be used in other vehicles besides the Jeep. To see if it will fit, just take the dimensions and compare them to the area where you want to install the seat. The Safari Jeep Seat is available in Vinyl/Cloth Combo, and Neoprene materials.

node.long_desc: RXP Rhino Seats;Bolster Support; Comes in either a low back or high back version; Harness Capability; Suspension System Seat; Extra durable, automotive grade cloth and vinyl materials; Steel Frame; Direct Bolt-In;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RXP Yamaha Rhino Seat is a direct bolt-in front replacement seat for your Yamaha Rhino. The RXP Yamaha Rhino Suspension Seat was designed for those who want the safety of suspension and the comfort of Corbeau. Get rid of those uncomfortable plastic seats and treat your back to the comfort of suspension. We integrated our state-of-the-art suspension technology with the comfort and design that Corbeau is known for, and from that came the RXP Yamaha Rhino Seat. The RXP Seat will enhance not only the look of your vehicle but also the overall driving experience. The RXP is available in a low back and high back version. The low back comes with a matching headrest cover to provide extra padding. As a rule of thumb the RXP Seat will fit up to a 38-40 inch waist. The RXP Yamaha Rhino Suspension Seat is available in all vinyl and vinyl/cloth fabrics.

node.display_name: Poison Spyder Brawler Lite Front Bumpers
node.long_desc: The RockBrawler is fabricated from 3/16 inch steel plate, CNC laser cut and brake-formed for a precise fit.;The Stinger is made of 1.75 inch X .120 wall DOM tubing.;The two D-ring shackle mounts are CNC-machined from 1 inch plate steel.; The integrated winch mount accepts most major manufacturer's winches up to 15,000 lbs.;Another characteristic of the RockBrawler is its amazing tire clearance.;RockBrawler bumpers are shipped as BARE STEEL.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Poison Spyder Customs RockBrawler is the bumper of choice for the wheeler who wants pure hardcore function coupled with a brawny attitude. The RockBrawler is fabricated from 3/16 inch high pressure steel plate, CNC laser cut and brake-formed for a precise fit. The Stinger is made of 1.75 inch X .120 wall DOM tubing, and extends inside the bumper shell to the inner braces for added strength.

The two D-ring shackle mounts are CNC-machined from 1 inch plate steel to provide brute strength for the most demanding recovery operations. Speaking of recovery, the integrated winch mount accepts most major manufacturer's winches up to 15,000 lbs. capacity, including the innovative Warn PowerPlant with integrated air compressor. The winch fairlead plate is flawlessly integrated into the bumper design, and doubles as gusseting for the Stinger, complete with Poison Spyder's signature oval lightning holes. Recessed light mounts are provided for retention of the factory fog lamps or aftermarket off-road lamps of your choice, and protect each one in a deep well of cold hard steel.

Another characteristic of the RockBrawler is its amazing tire clearance. The bumper has faceted ends that angle inward, giving your Jeep the ultimate in clearance for large tires, even under maximized suspension movement, and during full turn scenarios. The angled sillouhette of the bumper ends allow for this tire clearance while still protecting the lower corner of the Jeep's grille. The RockBrawler's removable lower cover has an integrated skid plate for protecting the front sway bar disconnect mechanism. Jeep JK models that are not equipped with the factory sway bar disconnect can still utilize this lower skid as added protection for the front end components. The fasteners for this cover/skid, as well as all external fasteners provided with the RockBrawler, are stainless steel flat-head cap screws for a flush surface and protection from the rocks.

node.long_desc: Bare steel;Universal application;Made of 1.25 x.120 DOM;Welding required for installation;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Easily add entry grab handles to your Jeep's cage. These handles come pre-bent, and laser-notched for a perfect fit on Poison Spyder's Trail Cages and Full Cage Kits. They should fit just about any other manufacturer's cages, or home-built cages for these and other Jeep models, with minor fitting of the notched ends. Made of high strength 1.25 X .120 DOM tubing. Requires welding."

node.long_desc: Posion Spyder Brawler Rockers are two piece mini-boatside" style rocker armor; Each component is fabricated of 3/16" plate steel to ensure your Jeep rocker panel is protected and fits like a glove; Oval lightning holes along the length of the wrangler rocker panel provides great looks and easy cleanup;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Jeep JK's, are extremely vulnerable to rocker armor damage on the trail. Poison Spyder Brawler Rockers provide the ultimate rocker armor protection while actually enhancing your Jeep's off-road capabilitynot to mention they look bad-ass! Brawler Rockers are two-piece mini-boatside" style rocker armor. Each component is fabricated entirely of CNC-laser cut, precision brake-formed 3/16" plate steel. The upper piece fits the lower section of your Jeep's exterior sheet metal like a glove, conforming to the subtle curvature of the JK and providing protection similar to Poison Spyder's JK Body Armor. The lower piece incorporates an extremely strong rub rail that protrudes about 3-1/4" outboard of the Jeep's body tub. The top surface of the rub rail may also serve as an entry step. Below, the brake-formed 3/16" plate steel angles down and inward to form a high clearance boatside for sliding off of rocks and obstacles. Inside, an array of beefy 3/16" thick internal gussets provide ultimate strength to the Brawler Rocker. Oval lightning holes along the length of the boatside section provide great Poison Spyder looks while allowing access to hose out mud and debris after a day on the trail. The ends of the Brawler Rockers are capped in the same 3/16" plate steel, in angled facets that allow up to a 40" tire and visually integrate with the lines of Poison Spyder front and rear JK Crusher Flares. The upper piece attaches to the body tube using supplied stainless steel flat-head cap screws and nut-serts. The lower piece attaches to the upper piece also with stainless steel flat-head cap screws and easy-to-install clip-nuts. All fastener holes are countersunk for a flat surface using the flat-head hardware. Underneath, the lower piece attaches at the Jeep's body mounts. Attaching the Brawler Rockers in this way, along several different planes, provides triangulated strength to the entire assembly. The body-mount tie-ins ensure that they are securely integrated to the strongest"

node.display_name: Poison Spyder Body Mounted Tire Carriers
node.long_desc: Poison Spyder Jeep Spare Tire Carrier;Bare steel;CNC laser cut;Fit up to 40 inch tire and wheel combo on this Jeep tire carrier;Mount for Hi-Lift jack;Includes all mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Poison Spyder's JK Body Mounted Tire Carrier works with the stock rear bumper or just about any aftermarket rear bumper, and can accomodate up to a 40 inch spare tire and accessories. The main tire carrier assembly is made of 1-1/2 inch DOM tubing for strength and great looks. All of the plate steel components are CNC laser cut and brake-formed from 1/8 inch or 3/16 inch steel plate. The hinge and latch assemblies are designed to address common issues inherent in similar tire carriers from other manufacturers. The tire carrier comes with mounting points to add several Rot-Pax fluid packs as well as a Hi-Lift jack.

They will hold 2 soft upper doors and three rear windows. Note: Some style rear windows may stick out a few inches.

node.sales_desc: Rampage Tonneau Cover is designed to protect the cab area and the storage bed of the vehicle. This tonneau cover features a durable soft top cover attached to a wind breaker rear section that seals the vehicle tight and protects it from wind, sun, dust and light rain. It includes a back windbreaker that quickly zips in and out for on-demand ventilation needs. This tonneau cover has a handy rear access door that zips open and close for rear access. It is easy to install and does not require drilling. This tonneau cover is the perfect accessory for the dusty off road adventures. It is backed by 90 day manufacturer warranty.

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 94100 Series Short Oval OBDII Compliant Universal Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Poison Spyder DIY Rear Stinger Tire Carriers
node.long_desc: The Poison Spyder Rear Stinger Jeep rear bumper is designed for those who spend most of their time in the rocks and need a tire carrier that meets the challenge.; By pulling the two upper pins,The Rear Stinger is basically a fold-down spare tire carrier.;This part number is for the DIY" Rear Stinger Tire Carrier without the Lower Mount Plate.;The Tire Carrier includes an integrated skid plate with laser cut lightning holes and Spyder logo.; It also has an integrated license plate mount located in the center of the carrier.; Tabs for the lower straps and a loop for the upper strap provide a secure mount for the 3-Way Spare Tire Strap.:This product ships as bare steelit will need to be painted or powder coated prior to final installation as your Wrangler rear bumper.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Poison Spyder Rear Stinger Tire Carrier is the ultimate rear bumper for hard core rock crawling. Like many Poison Spyder original designs, the Rear Stinger concept has been copied by many manufacturers, but none come close to the quality, function, performance and awesome appearance of original. Built for light weight, high clearance, ease of use and a measure of rear-flop protection, the Poison Spyder Rear Stinger is designed for those who spend most of their time in the rocks and need a tire carrier that meets the challenge.

The Rear Stinger is basically a fold-down spare tire carrier. By pulling the two upper pins, the tire carrier can swing down, making loading and unloading of ehuge off-road tires easier. Simply roll the tire up into the carrier, secure it with the provided 3-Way Spare Tire Strap, then swing the carrier back up and pin it in place. The main components are fabricated from NC-bent DOM tubing and CNC laser-cut plate steel.

This part number is for the DIY" Rear Stinger Tire Carrier without the Lower Mount Plate. This would be useful for those who would like to use the Poison Spyder Rear Stinger with their existing bumper, or for adapting it for use on Jeep models and other 4X4's for which we do not yet make a model-specific kit. Note that he kit does NOT provide mounting tabs to attach the Stinger to your bumper, so you will need to fabricate or source these tabs separately. Note that the upper attachment arms are located at the correct width and height for mounting to a TJ without a body lift. If you are using this kit with other vehicles you may wish to have us ship the kit with the arms un-welded, so that you may weld them in at your custom width/height during installation. If you would like the arms un-welded, please make a note of it in the comments section when ordering.

The Tire Carrier includes an integrated skid plate with laser cut lightning holes and Spyder logo. It also has an integrated license plate mo"

node.sales_desc: OFF CAMBER FABRICATIONS stands as the brand that Jeep enthusiasts rely on for superior quality and innovative design. As the Jeep accessories division of MBRP Inc. you can be sure that every Off Camber Fabrications product is hand built and jig assembled for a precision quality fit every time. Whether it's a modular cargo carrier or flashlight mount, all Off Camber Fabrications products are designed and built for Jeep enthusiasts by Jeep enthusiasts. Rigorously tested by our staff in the toughest environments, from the Moab back country to the bush of northern Canada, every product must earn the Off Camber Fabrications brand.

node.long_desc: Black;1.75 inch mandrel bent tube guard;Integrated winch mount;Fits all major centered winch models;Allows use of factory fog lights;2012 and newer models require vacuum relocation bracket sold separately, part number TER4403100;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex Epic front bumper for the JK Wrangler is designed to offer ultimate rock protection, and match the design styling of the JKs body. The epic front bumper is designed with an integrated winch mount. The bumper features recessed mounting, allowing taller winches to take up less grill space and increase radiator air flow for maximum cooling. This bumper will fit all major winch models with standard offset bolt pattern - including the larger Warn powerplant. A separate bumper is available for centered drum winches - like the Warn zeon. A 1.75 inch mandrel bent tube guard protects the winch, grill and radiator from potential damage. Integrated d-ring mounts aid with recovery equipment. The epic bumper also allows the use of the factory fog lights to retain factory styling and technology. Note: 2012+ Wranglers require the use of the JK Vacuum Pump Relocation Bracket Kit #4403100.

node.sales_desc: The 2-Low Kit from BD is designed to allow the operator to manually disable the front wheel drive mechanism by holding the hubs in the free (2WD) mode with the transfer case in 4-wheel drive-low range. By allowing the front wheels to be disengaged, maximum torque is available to the rear wheels.

node.sales_desc: One-piece CNC machined cover prevents warping, improper balancing and leakage plus overall reduced weight. Engineered dampener springs, better balancing, tighter tolerances and selfcentering clutch teeth design ensuring proper alignment and less friction wear resulting a longer converter life cycle and firmer drivability.

node.long_desc: Performance Transmission; Incl. HD Transmission Pan/Filter Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Revised Oil Circuits/Extra Clutches,Has Stronger Internals

node.long_desc: Build-It Trans Kit; Stage 5 Track-Master Kit;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: For Dodge applications that are pushed to the limits on the track, BD offers their Track Master Competition series built to take the extreme horsepower and torque. BD?s NEW ?Big? fine spline input shaft, 0.125 thicker than the stock size shaft and includes a hardened billet hub. By increasing Direct clutch apply piston width we increase apply pressure, and, by decreasing piston thickness we can install up to 30% more clutch surface. Matching BD?s Big bore, fine spline triple Torque Force Converter to the new Big Shaft make them designed for Competition 550 RWHP and above applications. By design, OEM transmission Helical gears and engine torque thrusting causes stock plastic and Babbitt thrust washers to melt and break down contaminating lubrication oil and damaging solenoids. We remove the thrust washers and install roller bearings throughout the transmission which eliminates oil contamination, maintains tolerances, reduces heat and prevents premature solenoid failure.

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 94400 Series Single Sensor OBDII Compliant Universal Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 95000 Series OBDII Compliant Direct Fit Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: Designed with ease of installation in mind, MagnaFlow's direct-fit converters are the perfect compliment to your OEM exhaust system. With no welding, cutting or bending required, you can easily add one of our direct-fit converters to your vehicle when it's time to replace your original catalytic converter. Whether your original converter has gone bad or you're just looking to upgrade to something more performance oriented, MagnaFlow's direct fit converters are just right. Featuring a ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, each converter features a stainless steel body and heat shield and contains a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Best of all, our 49-state direct-fit converters are in compliance with EPA guidelines so getting a car smog checked is a worry free task.;California Residents: WARNING"

Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.

People who are passionate about their vehicles do their best to stay on top of maintenance and treat their rides with tender care. Oftentimes, it also means customizing it to truly make it their own. A sleek, easy and affordable to do that is with some new Trail Master wheels.

Aesthetic Appeal
Wheels may serve a practical function, but they are also one of the parts that people tend to take a second glance at. The Trail Master TM9 series is a stylish addition thanks to its durable glossy black powder-coated finish. They have a rugged appeal that makes any Jeep look newer and tougher. They are available in different sizes to accommodate various bolt sizes and wheel diameters. Their universal fit makes it easy to find exactly what you need without having extra hassle during installation.

Affordable Quality Options
While ensuring your vehicle looks good may be important, quality and price are essential. Trail Master TM9 wheels are engineered with durable, high-quality steel alloy that can handle whatever Mother Nature or the road throws their way. Since they are made using the latest high-tech manufacturing equipment and process, it means you can get on the road without breaking the bank. These wheels are ideal for the budget-focused driver who deserves quality and style.

The Nomad Winch comes with a 4-way roller fairlead, steel cable, forged hook and a wired remote control with a magnetic mount to let you work hands-free when needed. Angled side rails provide a sleek look with less than 1 inch above the truck bed. Uniquely aerodynamic styling improves gas mileage. With Velcro brand "floating hook" technology, the hook moves on the rail. Works with tension control system to keep the cover tight, even when it's closed! Fully closed to fully open in 20 seconds. Allows for complete access to truck bed. Exclusive corner seals and weather seal on all four sides help keep the elements out. More seals than any other cover.

Being a truck owner means being ready for anything. Both work and play often require hauling gear or tools that need to be accessible. Most likely, you have invested a lot in that equipment, so the last thing you want is weather or onlookers to mess with that investment. When you need easy access and versatility, a soft roll-up tonneau cover is an ideal option to keep everything out of sight while also adding a sleek look to your vehicle. For maximum durability and easy installation and removal, TruXedo Lo Pro QT tonneau covers fit all the requirements.

A Versatile and Durable Option

A roll-up cover makes it easy to access a little or a lot of your truck bed. Since they don't have pre-determined folds, they allow for maximum versatility. They have a frame that clamps on the bed and doesn't require drilling. The TruXedo Lo Pro sits only inch above the bed, making it naturally complement your truck without getting in the way. It is constructed with industrial-grade leather that is re"

node.sales_desc: If you are experiencing less responsiveness in your 4 wheel drive axle, there is a good chance that your rubber diaphragm is cracking or breaking, impeding the operation of your four wheel drive truck or vehicle. Spicer 4WD vacuum actuator kits come with everything you need to make a complete repair, including all the gaskets and seals that prevent leaks and keep the elements out.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting LED Replacement Bulbs
node.long_desc: The 360 series LED bulbs consist of 5mm LED's that use the factory housing the same way a standard halogen bulb would, with a typical LED bulb having 28 of these LEDs. The benefit with LED is ten time less power consumption and instant on. Bulbs are designed to fit turn signals, brake lights, reverse indicators, dome lights, and any other standard light receptacle, with the exception of the headlights. Due to the increased efficiency of LED bulbs over halogen bulbs, your vehicle may have faster blinking that factory, because the vehicle doesn't get the halogen amperage draw. To resolve this, Vision X has introduced the HIL-Resistor which is sold separately, which increases the resistance and eliminates any fast blinking or bulb out indicators.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Trail Gear Differential Stud Eliminator Kit

node.display_name: Trail Gear Dirty 30 Birfield Axle Kit

The Dirty Thirty Axles also have a larger size axle shaft going into he birfield to eliminate the weak link in the assembly.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Trail Gear' s Rear Disc Kit ha a 3/8in. thick laser cut caliper bracket with grade 10.9 mounting bolts fro a super strong mounting system. Trail Gear uses the larger GM style calipers that are shipped fully loaded and include GM style vented rotors that were custom made just for this application. The DOT approved brake lines are made so that one end fits the GM calipers and the other end attaches to your OEM Toyota brake lines, so no new fittings are required. This kit does require either a 2 lb. residual valve or the ever popular 1in. bore master cylinder that most pick ups and 4Runners have already had upgraded. Also included with this kit are full color install instructions.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: EconoaidThrottle Body Booster Spins the incoming air as it passes through your throttle body and over the multitude of Econoaid blades. The turbulent air charge is carried through past intake valves for better atomization and more complete combustion! The Econoaid Throttle Body Booster will give you a crisper throttle response, along with better Gas Mileage. A huge benefit of the Econoaid is the fuel savings. The Results of this fuel saving device will always vary depending on vehicle type, driving habits, age of the vehicle, and driving environment, among other factors. However, from the reports of our customers, the average vehicle will see an extra 1-3 MPG and produce an extra 6-10 Ft.lbs of Torque, which can be felt from the increased low-end throttle response. The Econoaid Throttle Body Booster will pay for itself in no time at all, especially with current increasing gas prices.

Tie rod and drag link tubes feature wrench flats machined onto them and jam nuts for ease of adjustment.

node.long_desc: For use with Smittybilt generators;Gives you the ability to run 2 Smittybilt EPS generators simultaneously;Produce up to 2 times the power rating of the single EPS unit;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Remote Start and Off key fob included;Remote effective 40 foot range;Electronic choke to aid in remote start;2600 Watt max output, 2300 continuous;C.A.R.B approved 4-stroke , OHV gas engine;Low noise 56~63 dB, 58dB at 7M;Dual 120 VAC outlets, single 12VDC outlet;Overload protection;6-hour duty cycle at 50% load;1.5 gallon fuel tank;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Smittybilt EPS 2600W Premium Generator uses inch3-Phase Inversion Process inch inverter technology to provide, clean, quiet energy that is suitable for the most demanding requirements, including sensitive electronics. The EPS Premium Generator is rated at 2300W continuous/2600W peak operation, and is fully scalable using Smittybilt parallel connectors to link multiple EPS generators together for large energy needs. The use of Inverter technology dramatically reduces the size (L-24.2 inch x W-13.4 inch x H-19.9 inch) and weight (80 lbs dry) of the EPS 2600W Premium, making it exceptionally suited for use in campsites, RV's, cabins and other remote locations where power is not readily available. The Smart-Throttle system allows the engine to run at various speeds depending on load, greatly increasing fuel economy. The EPS 2600W Premium Generator holds 1.5 gallons of fuel, and is powered by an air-cooled 150cc 50-State EPA/CARB-Certified 4-Stroke OHV engine that is both quiet (53 to 63db max, depending on load) and efficient (up to 6 hours continuous operation at 50% load). The EPS 2600W Premium Generator is fully enclosed and is cased in a durable plastic housing with easy carry handle and rollers for easy positioning. The EPS has 2 120VAC and 1 12VDC outlets, Overload Protection, Low Oil Sensor, Parallel Cable Ports, Electric Start, and Digital Display for easy monitoring.

node.long_desc: Bilstein 9100 Series Bump Stop;Lower Mount: special;Upper Mount: special;Shaft Diameter: 1-1/4 inch;Reservoir: No;Finish: Electroless nickel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Bilstein 9100 Series Bump Stop improves suspension performance with more up-travel impact control and durability for off-road racing vehicles and prerunners. Protects vital suspension components like springs and shocks. The 9100 Series bump stops feature: Monotube gas pressure construction, 2?, 3?, and 4 inch travel available for expanded range of fitments, Seamless steel & electroless nickel finished design, Nitrogen adjustable spring rate capability, Delron contact pad for quiet performance.

node.long_desc: Steering Damper;Monotube;Yellow;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bilstein's technically superior, patented monotube gas charged design allows the excessive heat from the oil to transfer to the outer surface of the shock body and dissipate more efficiently. The dividing piston also permits the oil to expand as heat builds, preventing aeration (foaming) and viscosity loss. This allows the shock to maintain full damping characteristics as temperatures rise.The tube of a Bilstein Gas Pressure Shock Absorber is fabricated using a special extrusion method. This process achieves an extremely tight peak-to-valley tolerance and maintains consistent wall thickness. Bilstein's seamless monotube design provides superior tube strength while maximizing heat dissipation and shock life.The piston head design allows independent tuning of the compression and rebound damping forces to provide optimum ride comfort and performance without compromise. It features fewer parts than most conventional twin tube and so called road sensing shock designs. This simple, yet exceptionally functional digressive design contributes to the extreme durability and long life of Bilstein Shock Absorbers.

node.sales_desc: BILSTEIN's 5125 shocks offer BILSTEIN technology for custom lifted applications. B8 5125 shocks feature BILSTEIN's superior monotube gas pressure design for the utmost in consistent fade-free performance and long life.

node.long_desc: For Smooth Body;Monotube gas pressure construction;2.0 or 2.65"(OD) body;Hose length and fittings options: straight, 90 degree, 45 degree;Valving can be adjusted internally for rebound and compression;Completely owner rebuildableFor Coilover:;Monotube gas pressure construction;Designed to combine the function of damper and spring;2.0" or 2.65 (OD) Body;Coil Spring Hardware: 3" or 3-5/8" (ID);Hose Length and Fittings Options: Straight, 90 degree, 45 degree;Valving can be adjusted internally for rebound and compression;Completely owner rebuildable;Special Notes:BILSTEIN does not manufacture or sell coil springs for off-road use. However, most BILSTEIN off-road retailers sell springs. They can also offer advice on spring rates;It is not recommended to use a coilover in conjunction with an auxiliary spring source, such as Leaf Springs or Torsion Bars.For Bypass:;Widest range of tuning combinations within the industry;Available in 2.0" or 2.65" body;Completely owner tunable and rebuildable;Available in piggyback and various hose lengths;Bypass tubes allow for position sensitive damping adjustability - custom bypass layouts available;Special Notes:External Bypass dampers require an external spring source such as a coilover, leaf spring, torsion bar, or auxiliary coil. These dampers will not support a vehicle.For Rock Crawler:;Monotube gas pressure construction;Nickel plated 2" diameter threaded body;2.5" x 12" reservoir with -8 aeroquip match mate hose;Hard anodized screw top and aurora spherical bearings;Valved specifically for rock crawling;Optional coilover setup with dual rate spring;Available in 12", 14" and 17" travel;Completely owner rebuildable;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Developed for the professional off-road racer, the BILSTEIN 9100 (Smooth Body) shocks are truly state-of-the-art. The smooth body is an extreme duty take-apart damper designed for off-road racing. Developed for the professional off-road racer, the 9100 (Coilover) is truly state-of-the-art. The coilover offers the same damping features as the standard body shock with the ability to mount an external coil spring for load carrying capability.BILSTEIN 9100 (Bypass) shocks were developed for the professional racer, and are truly state-of-the-art. It is an extreme duty, take-apart monotube damper designed specifically for off-road racing.Designed for the rapidly growing rock crawler market, the 9100 (Rock Crawler) features BILSTEIN's industry leading technology and the experience gained in decades of off-road competition.

node.long_desc: Bilstein 5100 Series Steering Damper;Shaft Diameter: 11mm;Reservoir: No;Finish: Zinc plated;Body Design: 46mm ID smooth body (Non-coilover);Internal Design: Mono tube;Boot Included: Yes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bilstein 5100 Series Steering Dampers are designed specifically to help you maintain complete command of your truck, van or SUV at all times. A 5100 Series Steering Damper equipped vehicle offers a much more controlled feeling, allowing you to get the true feeling of your vehicle and what it is capable of. Utilizing our proven design, the steering damper is able to dampen minute movements in the steering and reduce steering vibrations that naturally occur especially in older vehicles. These dampers are the least expensive and most effective upgrade to extend the service life of any vehicle out on the road today.

node.sales_desc: Replaces bar pins on after-market shock installations to properly mount shock absorbers. The original bar pin mounts are not capable of sustaining the abuse of rock crawling. These heavy duty components are machined from billet stock and are gold zinc plated for long life. Sold as a kit.

node.long_desc: Deep cryogenic treatment is a one-time process that permanently improves the performance and service life of metals from brake rotors and engine parts, to machine tools and gear sets. Using a proprietary computer-controlled process, the metal is cooled gradually to -300?F and then slowly returned to room temperature and heat-cycled as the final step. Although not apparent to the naked eye, the improvements to the rotor are significant. The cryogenic treatment process redistributes residual stress in the rotor giving it an extra level of protection against warping.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Deep cryogenic treatment is a one-time process that permanently improves the performance and service life of metals from brake rotors and engine parts, to machine tools and gear sets. Using a proprietary computer-controlled process, the metal is cooled gradually to -300?F and then slowly returned to room temperature and heat-cycled as the final step. Although not apparent to the naked eye, the improvements to the rotor are significant. The cryogenic treatment process redistributes residual stress in the rotor giving it an extra level of protection against warping.

node.long_desc: SportStop drilled or drilled and slotted rotors are a great first upgrade for the original brake systems of cars and trucks, delivering winning performance and increased stopping power. This keeps fresh pad material exposed to the rotor surface and promotes more consistent braking performance.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: SportStop drilled or drilled and slotted rotors are a great first upgrade for the original brake systems of cars and trucks, delivering winning performance and increased stopping power. node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 35 3.73 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.sales_desc: The Allison 1000 is a great transmission, but it has its shortcomings, particularly in high-performance, heavy-duty use applications. BD can help improve the life of your transmission as well as improve its performance with one of our modified Allison valve bodies. First, all of the mating surfaces are lapped to remove surface irregularities that can cause oil cross flow, clutch pack pressure loss, slippage, irregular shifting and error codes. Then, we install new trim valves that allow the mainline pressure to be increased, which creates more clamping force on the clutch plates.

node.sales_desc: The BD Stealth Cover for the 1998.5 to 2002 Dodge 24V fits onto the VP44 injection pump, providing a secure, sealed connection instead of notching the pump wire for power mods like an Edge Comp or TST box. A notched wire is not only noticeable, but a break in the wire cover can result in corrosion and a poor connection. The Stealth Cover from BD makes for a clean install and easy removal of racing performance boxes, plus it provides a more reliable connection. A must for the enthusiast.

node.long_desc: Cast From High Silicon Ductile Iron;Features Expansion Joint;Has Quicker Turbo Spool-Up;Reduced Backpressure/Increased Power;Better Fuel Economy;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Stop exhaust manifold cracks in their tracks with BDs Pulse exhaust manifold for the Dodge-Cummins. Cast from high silicon ductile iron, the Pulse features expansion joints that allow the manifold to expand and contract without cracking or exhaust leaks. As the name would imply, these manifolds are inchpulse tuned inch to assist in combustion chamber evacuation and increased exhaust flow. The result is quicker turbo spool-up, reduced backpressure, increased power and better fuel economy.

node.long_desc: G2 Axle & Gear Ring and Pinion;Engineered and manufactured to handle increased load;Forged from high-strength 8620 Steel;Precision-machined to OE specifications for perfect mesh;Tight tolerances ensure easy set up and quiet OE-like operation;Double-lapped and shot-peened for improved longevity;Heat-treated for added durability;Wide application range from;Full 10-year warranty ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
G2 Axle & Gear ring & pinion sets are engineered with the most advanced manufacturing process to stand up to the most demanding applications you might encounter. Designed from the ground up to hold up to oversized tires and high performance engines, these ultra-durable gears use use the latest technology and materials to offer the strongest and quietest performance on the market.

The process to produce such a high-quality G2 ring & pinion set is a long one, but the time-tested process ensures only the highest quality end product. For starters, only 8620 Steel is used to provide the most robust set around. The gears are forged then machined to exacting tolerances. This makes the G2 ring & pinion mesh perfectly, allowing for OE-like operation that won't have you running for earplugs--they're that quiet.

After the machining process, the ring & pinion are double-lapped to make the mating surface as smooth as possible, reducing friction and thereby extending longevity and service life. Moreover, the gears are also shot-peened and heat-treated to further improve strength for high-performance applications.

G2's Axle & Gear's ring & pinion sets are available for a wide range of vehicles, including AMC/Chrysler, Dana 30/35, Dana 44, Dana 50/60/70, Ford, GM, Toyota and Suzuki.

node.display_name: G2 Axle & Gear Replacement Axle Shafts
node.long_desc: High Strength Alloy Steel;Heat treated;Big spline options;Rolled splines;Wheel studs included;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: G2's high strength axle shafts are engineered to withstand the added load of high torque applications and to remedy the common faults found with factory shafts. Forged from high grade alloy steel and heat treated to exceed OEM specifications, these axles are designed for extended service life. Added features such as Big Spline options, rolled splines and use of better materials allow you to confidently run larger tires without the risk of failure.

node.sales_desc: The HD forged front flip draglink has been designed to solve several front end issues with lifted JK Wranglers. The new draglink is 'flipped' over the knuckle, and uses a new tapered insert to mount the draglink into the knuckle. The HD draglink is 50% stronger than the factory draglink to help eliminate front end shimmy and other alignment issues. The forged draglink will thread into the factory adjusting sleeve. This draglink is designed to work with lifts over 3. The kit also includes a frame side trackbar drop bracket to keep steering geometry correct, and a frame brace strengthens the frame to further reduce any front end shimmy or excess movement. Welding required to install."

node.display_name: Auto Ventshade Color Matched Aeroskin Hood Protectors
node.long_desc: Stylish aerodynamic appearance;Mounts flush for skin tight fit;Lowest profile on the market;Car wash safe;No drilling required;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The AVS Aeroskin hood shield is perfect for those seeking a non-obtrusive designer look for their truck, SUV or car. The hood shield, designed to flow with the contours of your vehicle's hood, creates a sleek, stylish profile, flush mounting to your hood. Custom-molded and made in the USA, the AVS Aeroskin is precision-engineered to fit your vehicle's hood perfectly. The shield's low profile hugs the surface skin-tight providing excellent protection from the hazards of the road. The shield's durable yet flexible acrylic material makes this accessory wear-and-tear resistant as well as car-wash-safe. The hood shield is available in a smoke or chrome finish. Easy-to-install, no drilling or special hardware required Installing the AVS Aeroskin is easy and can be completed at home in minutes. This designer hood shield mounts directly to your hood with double-sided 3M tape, there is no drilling or special hardware required. Backed by Limited Lifetime Warranty AVS has been making great products since 1935 for a reason and understands the importance of delivering a quality product. AVS offers a Limited Lifetime Warranty to protect your AVS Aeroskin hood shield. Buy yours today and you'll have the perfect finishing touch for your car or truck.
